addr: 1356 South La Brea Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90019
title: Annual Holiday Mixer
desc: The season is upon us once again and we are looking forward to celebrating with current and new members.? As it is the season of giving, we ask that you please bring an unwrapped?toy or book and a $10 tax dedectible contribution to the Watts Willowbrook Boys & Girls Club to the mixer. You can also pay your tax deductible membership dues of $155 at this event and receive a $30 discount.? Checks should be made payable to  Urban Bankers .? (Note:? $30 discount good through December 31, 2015). We wish you every happiness this Holiday Season and prosperity in the New Year.? Thank you for your support and dedication and we look forward to continuing our efforts and success with you in 2016. All the best to you and your family! Urban Financial Services Coalition UFSC - Los Angeles Chapter  www.ufscla.org
